amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Revised Statutes Cumulative Supplement, 2024
amendatorysection.catchline: Bank's rights and duties with respect to deposit account.
amendatorysection.para: Except as otherwise provided in section 9-340(c), and unless the bank otherwise agrees in a signed record, a bank's rights and duties with respect to a deposit account maintained with the bank are not terminated, suspended, or modified by:
(1) the creation, attachment, or perfection of a security interest in the deposit account;
(2) the bank's knowledge of the security interest; or
(3) the bank's receipt of instructions from the secured party.
